wikipedia_page.main: Peter James Ellis (28 January 1948 – 24 April 2006) was a British director who helped develop a number of television episodes. These included popular shows such as “Supernatural” and “Criminal Minds”.

response: Ellis lives with his wife Meredith in southwest France. His younger brothers are the actor Jack Ellis and the director Peter Ellis.
*Peter Ellis (architect) (1805–1884), architect who designed the Oriel Chambers in Liverpool
*Peter Ellis (rugby league) (born 1976), former professional rugby league footballer
*Peter Ellis (childcare worker) (born 1958), New Zealander jailed for child molestation in 1993
*Peter Ellis, candidate of the Green Party of Canada

He and his former wife Christine Kavanagh, from whom he is now divorced, have two children, Theo and Alice. He was educated at Highgate School as were his older brothers Robin Ellis, also an actor, and Peter Ellis, a director.

Filming took place in various locations in Los Angeles during summer 1982 under the direction of Peter Ellis. Director of photography was Peter Appleton, the art director was Mike Porter and the costume designer was Jo Korer.
